name: The Lost Mages
description:
While I never played the lost vikings during it's release era, I did play it a few years ago. I did enjoy having to mix the abilities of the vikings to traverse the obstacles they face to get back home.

This game tries to recreate the experience by following the story of three apprentice mages. Story is yet to be completely defined.

Title is as well temporal, it was the first name that came to mind of course :)
